mainSectionSubTitle: We specialize in experiences that capture attention and deliver results. From immersive mall activations and human living statues to interactive brand engagements, seasonal campaigns, curated live talent, and concept-to-execution services—including tenant shop launches—we create experiences that resonate with shoppers and elevate brand presence, all executed with creativity and professionalism.

services.title: Science Safari
services.subTitle: A premium, guided mall-based STEM experience designed to transform children's curiosity into an exciting journey of discovery. Tailored for kids aged 5–15, the activation blends hands-on experiments, creative building challenges, and interactive learning zones in a safe, engaging, and visually immersive setup.
services.imgAlt: Science Safari logo - Discover Play Learn

services.title: Experiential Mall Activations
services.subTitle: Immersive in-mall experiences that spark interaction, increase dwell time, and elevate shopper journeys. Includes interactive installations, walk-through experiences, themed experiential setups, shopper engagement touchpoints, and campaign & seasonal activations.

services.title: Human Living Statues & Living Billboards
services.subTitle: Professionally styled performers who become high-impact living visuals, creating curiosity, buzz, and shareable moments. Includes living statues, living billboards, visual storytelling, and crowd pullers & wayfinding moments.
services.imgAlt: Human living statue performing at mall activation

services.title: Interactive Brand Engagement
services.subTitle: Human-led, participatory experiences that create meaningful connections between shoppers and brands. Sub-services include Brand Ambassadors (BAs), guided brand storytelling, interactive challenges & gamified experiences, and experiential sampling.

services.title: Seasonal & Calendar-Based Mall Campaigns
services.subTitle: Experiential activations aligned to key retail and cultural moments, designed to create buzz, increase footfall, and strengthen the mall experience. Includes Valentine's activations, Easter experiences, Mother's & Father's Day campaigns, Back-to-School activations, and festive & cultural seasonal campaigns.

services.title: Experiential Entertainment Curation
services.subTitle: Live talent and entertainment carefully selected to complement experiences and elevate atmosphere. Sub-services include live musicians, themed performers, movement artists, character performers, and talent booking & coordination.

services.title: Experiential Concept Design & Execution
services.subTitle: End-to-end service for creating and executing experiences that engage shoppers, amplify brand presence, and deliver results. Includes experience ideation, visual storytelling, on-ground execution, and professional supervision.
